GitCommitPlugin.CustomCommitType.label: build
GitCommitPlugin.CustomCommitType.detail: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)

GitCommitPlugin.CustomCommitType.label: ci
GitCommitPlugin.CustomCommitType.detail: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)

GitCommitPlugin.CustomCommitType.label: perf
GitCommitPlugin.CustomCommitType.detail: A code change that improves performance

GitCommitPlugin.CustomCommitType.label: refactor
GitCommitPlugin.CustomCommitType.detail: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

GitCommitPlugin.CustomCommitType.label: style
GitCommitPlugin.CustomCommitType.detail: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

GitCommitPlugin.CustomCommitType.label: test
GitCommitPlugin.CustomCommitType.detail: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
